answers.answer: atleast u gained some weight. by my 4th month I still had no weight gain but showing a small bump already. it depends on each pregnancy.
Every one is different.  It could be normal for you. As long as your ob/gyn isn't concerned,  I wouldn't worry about it.
Thanks ladies that helps a lot
I'm 13 weeks and I'll be 14 weeks on Tuesday and I have lost weight.  Before I was pregnant I was 115 pounds. I am now only 102 pounds... I want to gain weight so bad but I can't stop puking.
Im 17 weeks and have actually lost 2 pounds since my last check up.I wouldnt worry about weight too much just because at the end of your pregnancy your going to gain weight like crazy

I didn't start gaining weight till about 20 weeks. Im currently 27 weeks and have gained about 6 kgs. And im very small. So don't worry hun. Every one carries different. And every pregnancy is different. As long as bub is healthy and developing normally then no need to worry.
Yes that is very normal. With my 1st pregnancy I didn't start showing until I was 5 1/2 month pregnant.
At first I was taking my vitamins without a problem now I cant swallow them or even smell them are there any chewable vitamins I can take
At first I was taking my vitamins without a problem now I cant swallow them or even smell them are there any chewable vitamins I can take
I'm 5 months and I've only gained 3 lbs. I was at the doctor today and he said my weight is fine.

I'm 20 weeks and 1 day and still haven't gained weight. Over all I've lost 4 lbs...but I see my doctor Friday and I think I've gained it back but I don't know. Having gestational diabetes kinda helps since I'm on a diet but I wouldn't wish that on anyone just to lose weight...it's stressful.

question: I'm worried about my size I have no stomach I've only gained 3 pounds && I'm 4 months next week is this normal???
title: Serious question I need answered asap
